PositionSensorVRDevice.summary: IMPORTANT Deprecated The PositionSensorVRDevice interface of the WebVR API represents VR hardware's position sensor. You can access information such as the current position and orientation of the sensor in relation to the head mounted display through the method.

PositionSensorVRDeviceGetImmediateState.summary: IMPORTANT Deprecated The getImmediateState() method of the interface returns the current instantaneous position sensor state. This is intended to only be used rarely, for certain special uses, for example sampling the immediate position of a hand orientation sensor â€” or at least it will be, in the future.

PositionSensorVRDeviceGetState.summary: IMPORTANT Deprecated The getState() method of the interface returns the current state of the position sensor for the current frame (e.g., within the current callback) or for the previous frame, contained with a object. This is the method you'd normally want to use, vs. .

PositionSensorVRDeviceResetSensor.summary: IMPORTANT Deprecated The resetSensor() method of the interface can be used to reset the sensor if desired, returning the position and orientation values to zero.
